TTP Summary: Harvest config, keys, endpoints and deployment habits from public repos, issues, wikis, package manifests.
Preconditions: Public repos/docs/issues; leaked env files; verbose READMEs.
Targets / Surface: GitHub/GitLab, package.json, Cargo.toml, Dockerfiles, CI logs.
Indicators / Signals: Repo scraping, secrets in history, exposed endpoints in docs.
Mitigations (High-level): Secret scanning, rotate keys, move secrets to Vault/KMS, redact docs.
Detection Ideas: Monitor forks/stars/spikes; scan PR history; detect secret patterns in commits.
Evidence to Collect: Repo history, PR diffs, leaked tokens list, access logs to endpoints.

TTP Summary: Enumerate subdomains, API routes and ports to build an attack surface map.
Preconditions: DNS records resolvable; perimeter accessible; misconfigured DNS/ingress.
Indicators / Signals: Burst of DNS queries; HTTP 404/405 patterns; TLS cert transparency entries.
Mitigations (High-level): Harden ingress; hide staging; rate-limit; WAF; robots.txt hygiene.
Detection Ideas: Detect enum spikes; honey endpoints; TLS CT monitoring.
Evidence to Collect: DNS logs, CDN logs, WAF hits, cert transparency alerts.

TTP Summary: Lure user to fake login, steal credentials or MFA seeds/backup codes.
Preconditions: User with reused passwords; weak SSO hygiene; lookalike domains.
Targets / Surface: Web portals, admin panels, email inboxes, CI dashboards.
Indicators / Signals: Login success from new ASN; user-agent anomalies; impossible travel.
Tools / Techniques: Evilginx, Gophish, lookalike domains, proxy relays.
Mitigations (High-level): FIDO2/WebAuthn; phishing-resistant MFA; domain protection.
Detection Ideas: UEBA rules; sign-in risk scoring; brand domain monitoring.
Evidence to Collect: Auth logs, MFA challenges, IP/ASN map, mail gateway logs.

TTP Summary: Publish higher-version package in public registry to hijack builds or runtimes.
Preconditions: Build pulls from public registry; same package name; auto-update.
Targets / Surface: Build agents, runtime containers, serverless functions.
Indicators / Signals: Unexpected dependency version; unusual DNS exfil from builds.
Tools / Techniques: npm/pip/rust typosquats, package takeover, preinstall scripts.
Mitigations (High-level): Private registry, pin hashes, SBOM + provenance (SLSA), signature verify.
Detection Ideas: Alert on dep drift; verify checksums; diff SBOM on CI.
Evidence to Collect: SBOM, lockfiles, registry logs, build agent egress logs.

TTP Summary: Trick user to sign malicious EIP-2612 permit/EIP-712 typed data to drain funds.
Preconditions: User connects wallet; UI obfuscates domain/intent.
Targets / Surface: User wallets, approvals to tokens/vaults, permit signatures.
Indicators / Signals: Burst of approvals; new unlimited allowance; off-hours drain.
Tools / Techniques: Fake dApps, signature relays, malicious banners.
Mitigations (High-level): Human-readable signing (EIP-712), spend limits, session keys, allowlist domains.
Detection Ideas: Detect sudden allowance spikes; on-chain monitor for Approve events.
Evidence to Collect: Mempool txs, ERC20 Approval logs, dApp domain records, wallet telemetry.

TTP Summary: Abuse RPC/gateway with spoofed origins or keys to submit crafted payloads.
Preconditions: Weak API keys; lack of mTLS; permissive CORS; origin not checked.
Indicators / Signals: High-rate method calls; odd chainId; unknown origins.
Tools / Techniques: Scripted JSON-RPC floods; crafted eth_call/estimateGas probes.
Mitigations (High-level): API key binding, mTLS, per-origin allowlists, rate quotas.
Detection Ideas: Detect origin mismatches; quota anomaly detection.
Evidence to Collect: Gateway logs, origin headers, key usage meter, TLS client cert logs.

TTP Summary: Untrusted contract re-enters before state updates to drain funds.
Preconditions: External call before effects; no reentrancy guard; balances not updated first.
Indicators / Signals: Multiple nested calls; repeated balance change in one tx.
Tools / Techniques: Crafted contracts, fallback functions, flashbots bundling.
Mitigations (High-level): Checks-Effects-Interactions; reentrancy guards; pull payments.
Detection Ideas: Invariant checks on balances; call-depth heuristics.
Evidence to Collect: Internal traces, storage diffs, event sequences.

TTP Summary: Move price via thin liquidity or TWAP gaps to borrow/drain against inflated value.
Preconditions: Oracle uses spot price without TWAP; manipulable pool; no sanity bounds.
Indicators / Signals: Short spike in reserve ratios; TWAP vs spot divergence.
Mitigations (High-level): TWAP/chainlink oracles; price bounds; circuit breakers.
Detection Ideas: Detect TWAP/spot deviation > threshold; alert abnormal swaps.
Evidence to Collect: DEX events, oracle updates, pool reserves.

TTP Summary: Math wraps to attacker advantage when not using safe math or wrong types.
Preconditions: Unchecked ops; custom math; old compiler.
Indicators / Signals: Large values wrap; anomalies in totalSupply/balances.
Tools / Techniques: Malicious tx values; fuzz inputs near limits.
Mitigations (High-level): SafeMath/libs; solidity ^0.8.x checks; property tests.
Detection Ideas: Fuzz near boundaries; monitor for >max values.
Evidence to Collect: Tx traces, revert reasons, storage snapshots.

TTP Summary: Sensitive functions callable by anyone or wrong role checks.
Preconditions: No modifiers; upgradeable init not locked; proxy admin exposed.
Indicators / Signals: Unexpected state change by EOA; role-grant events missing.
Tools / Techniques: Direct call to admin fn; delegatecall to bypass.
Mitigations (High-level): RBAC, timelocks, least-privilege, pause switches.
Detection Ideas: Alert on state change without matching AdminRole event.
Evidence to Collect: Admin txs, role events, proxy admin logs.

TTP Summary: Borrow huge funds atomically to manipulate markets/oracles and settle in same tx.
Preconditions: Flash liquidity available; protocols trust instantaneous state.
Indicators / Signals: Unusual large atomic flows; sudden profit spikes.
Tools / Techniques: Flash loan providers, bundlers, MEV tools.
Mitigations (High-level): Design for oracle resilience; block atomic dependencies.
Detection Ideas: Detect large same-block borrow/settle patterns.
Evidence to Collect: Event logs: Borrow/Repay/Swap within block.

TTP Summary: Exploit malleable signatures or reused nonces to replay/forge.
Preconditions: No EIP-155, chainId omitted, old malleable ECDSA patterns.
Indicators / Signals: Duplicate tx with different sig; cross-chain replay.
Tools / Techniques: Crafted sigs, altered ‘v’ values, replay relays.
Mitigations (High-level): EIP-155, strict chainId/nonce domain sep, EIP-712.
Detection Ideas: Detect duplicates by message hash; nonce gap alerts.
Evidence to Collect: Signed payload archives, nonce tables.

TTP Summary: Obtain or plant a key with admin rights to upgrade or drain systems.
Preconditions: Poor key storage; hot wallets; no HSM; seed reuse.
Indicators / Signals: Admin actions from new addresses; multisig changes.
Tools / Techniques: Phishing, malware, SIM swap, cold wallet theft.
Mitigations (High-level): Multisig, HSM, hardware wallets, rotation, timelocks.
Detection Ideas: Alert on admin set changes; require multiple signers.
Evidence to Collect: Gnosis Safe logs, key rotation records, EOA provenance.

TTP Summary: Acquire voting power briefly to pass malicious proposals.
Preconditions: Flash-loanable governance tokens; quorum low; no snapshot delay.
Indicators / Signals: Spike in voting power; proposal passes unusually fast.
Mitigations (High-level): Snapshot-based voting; timelocks; quorum thresholds.
Detection Ideas: Detect power spike pre-vote; anomalous proposal content.
Evidence to Collect: Proposal history, token balances over time.

TTP Summary: Move stolen funds through mixers/bridges to obfuscate flow.
Preconditions: Bridge available; tokens widely supported.
Targets / Surface: Stolen assets on L1/L2; wrapped assets.
Indicators / Signals: Bridging just after exploit; mixer deposits.
Mitigations (High-level): Sanctions lists, bridge monitoring, risk scoring.
Detection Ideas: Detect exploit tx → rapid bridge/mix sequence.
Evidence to Collect: Bridge logs, mixer interactions, chain analytics.

TTP Summary: Modify or omit events to hide critical actions.
Preconditions: Upgradable contracts; events not enforced.
Indicators / Signals: Drop in expected events; off-by-one counters.
Tools / Techniques: Upgrade to new impl lacking emits.
Mitigations (High-level): Immutable logging, checks on emit presence.
Detection Ideas: Detect sudden event silence patterns.
Evidence to Collect: Contract diffs, ABI events vs. runtime events.

TTP Summary: Steal service keys/mnemonics from CI, images, or repos.
Preconditions: Secrets in env or images; weak access control.
Targets / Surface: CI agents, Docker layers, k8s secrets.
Indicators / Signals: New tokens from unknown IPs; image pulls by outsiders.
Tools / Techniques: Registry scrape, image export, S3 sync.
Mitigations (High-level): Vault/KMS, sealed secrets, image scanning, no-hardcode policy.
Detection Ideas: Alert on new token use; diff image layers for secrets.
Evidence to Collect: CI logs, image manifests, secret rotation records.

TTP Summary: Probe internal APIs to learn topology and permissions.
Preconditions: Weak network segmentation; verbose error messages.
Targets / Surface: Internal APIs, service mesh, message buses.
Indicators / Signals: 401/403 to 200 ratio changes; 404 maps.
Mitigations (High-level): Network policies, service auth, error minimization.
Detection Ideas: Detect unusual internal scan patterns.
Evidence to Collect: Service logs, mTLS failure logs, mesh telemetry.

TTP Summary: Reuse stolen bearer/JWT tokens to call privileged APIs.
Preconditions: Token exfil; long TTL; no binding to client.
Indicators / Signals: Legit token used from new IP/UA; odd call sequences.
Mitigations (High-level): Short TTL, DPoP/MTLS-bound tokens, revoke on anomaly.
Detection Ideas: UEBA alerts on token fingerprint mismatch.
Evidence to Collect: Auth logs, token introspection records.

TTP Summary: Exploit unbounded queries to pull large datasets.
Preconditions: No pagination/limits; no authZ filters.
Indicators / Signals: Large response sizes; many sequential pages.
Mitigations (High-level): Pagination, per-user row-level authZ, cost analysis.
Detection Ideas: Detect over-limit queries; GraphQL cost alarms.
Evidence to Collect: API logs, query plans, response size histograms.

TTP Summary: Stream data in small chunks to bypass thresholds.
Preconditions: Streaming allowed; no anomaly detection.
Indicators / Signals: Long-lived connections; steady small throughput.
Mitigations (High-level): Rate shaping, quotas by user/token, DLP on streams.
Detection Ideas: Detect long-lived streams with uniform rate.
Evidence to Collect: Stream duration logs, per-conn bytes, DLP hits.

TTP Summary: Embed instructions in calldata/events for bots to read.
Preconditions: Bots watch chain; calldata unreadable to victims.
Indicators / Signals: Weird small txs to fixed addr; data-pattern OP_RETURN style.
Mitigations (High-level): Flag suspicious patterns, entropy checks, deny known C2 addrs.
Detection Ideas: Detect repetitive small txs with encoded payloads.
Evidence to Collect: Tx data samples, entropy stats, known badlists.

TTP Summary: Deploy token, attract liquidity, then withdraw or mint to dump.
Preconditions: Centralized mint/owner rights; no timelock; no audits.
Indicators / Signals: Owner mint/withdraw events; LP token burn; price collapse.
Mitigations (High-level): Renounce ownership or timelock; multi-sig; public audits.
Detection Ideas: Detect owner function use post-TGE; whale transfers.
Evidence to Collect: Token events (Mint/Burn/Transfer), LP remove, price feed.

TTP Summary: Forge cross-chain messages or bypass verification to mint wrapped assets.
Preconditions: Weak light client; multisig compromised; insufficient proofs.
Indicators / Signals: Large mints without matching lock; sudden bridge pause.
Tools / Techniques: Custom proof forgery, multisig compromise, replay.
Mitigations (High-level): Verified light clients, zk proofs, rate limits, pause.
Detection Ideas: Detect unbacked mints; mismatch between chains.
Evidence to Collect: Mint/burn on both chains, validator sets, proof logs.

TTP Summary: Control majority hash/stake to double-spend or censor transactions.
Preconditions: Centralized hash/stake; low participation; bribery possible.
Indicators / Signals: Deep reorgs; empty blocks; delayed confirmations.
Mitigations (High-level): Economic decentralization; slashing; finality checkpoints.
Detection Ideas: Detect orphan spikes; monitor validator behavior.
Evidence to Collect: Block graphs, fork choice telemetry, validator stats.

TTP Summary: Insert transactions before/after victim to extract value.
Preconditions: Public mempool; no private orderflow; low slippage protection.
Indicators / Signals: Victim tx surrounded by two attacker txs; abnormal price impact.
Mitigations (High-level): Use private tx relays; set slippage; anti-MEV pools.
Detection Ideas: Detect paired txs with same block and correlated tokens.
Evidence to Collect: Block tx ordering, DEX price impact metrics.

TTP Summary: Race to liquidate/arb after price updates to capture profit.
Preconditions: Liquidation bots active; slow oracles; exposed keeper keys.
Indicators / Signals: Burst of liquidations right after oracle tick.
Mitigations (High-level): Keeper auth, circuit breakers, faster oracles.
Detection Ideas: Detect liquidation bursts; cross-check oracle delays.
Evidence to Collect: Liquidation events, oracle tick logs.

TTP Summary: Craft txs that raise gas usage or revert later to waste user funds or block execution paths.
Preconditions: Functions with unbounded loops; external calls before checks.
Targets / Surface: Contracts with loops over user data; auctions.
Indicators / Signals: High gas spikes; repeated reverts.
Mitigations (High-level): Gas caps, bounded loops, pre-checks before calls.
Detection Ideas: Detect revert patterns; gas anomaly alerts.
Evidence to Collect: Gas usage histograms, revert reasons.

TTP Summary: Unsanitized input changes query or template logic to run attacker code/queries.
Preconditions: Dynamic queries, poor escaping, user-controlled templates.
Indicators / Signals: Errors with syntax; unexpected data exfiltration.
Mitigations (High-level): Parametrized queries, sanitizers, WAF rules.
Detection Ideas: Detect payload signatures; anomaly in query plans.
Evidence to Collect: DB logs, query traces, WAF hits.

TTP Summary: Crafted objects trigger gadget chains for RCE or logic abuse.
Preconditions: Binary formats, unsafe parsers, auto-binding.
Indicators / Signals: Weird object types; stack traces; CPU spikes.
Mitigations (High-level): Safe parsers, deny-lists, strict types.
Detection Ideas: Detect odd class names; sandbox parsing.
Evidence to Collect: App logs, crash dumps.
